mission.posting: Coel needs help covering something up that could be potentially dangerous for her.

email.subject: Coel - Coverup Final
email.body: I'm now safe from the eyes of Pacific Air and Psylance. There's one more place we have to hit before I'm completely scott-free. The American government. Obviously, this one's more risky because if we get caught, well let's just say the punishment's gonna be a bit more severe. Get into the White House's network and delete all traces of Coel. Good luck, -Coel

attachments.note: Help Coel coverup her past activities. Infiltrate the White House's network. Delete all traces of Coel.
